summary: Arms trafficker Hyuk and Young-chun are practically brothers and nothing can separate them. When the two managed to escape from North Korea, they left behind Hyuk's younger brother Chul. ... See full summary »
cast: Ju Jin-Mo|Seung-heon Song|Kang-woo Kim|Han Sun Jo|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Jee-Young Kim|Hae-gon Kim|Hyeong-jun Lim|Tae-hwa Seo|Sin-seong Lee
director: Directors: Hae-sung Song (as Hye-seong Song), Hae-sung Song
title: Moo-jeok-ja
